Solarburst.Name: Solarburst
Solarburst.Description: Aptly named after its burst of sweet, sunny flavor.

Big Mamba.Name: Big Mamba
Big Mamba.Description: Despite its size, it goes down faster than you think. That snake's a sneaky one.

Grizzle Guzzle.Name: Grizzle Guzzle
Grizzle Guzzle.Description: It's said that those who drink this and venture into Grizzlewood will see a strange creature lurking about.

Deathwish.Name: Deathwish
Deathwish.Description: Please don't kill me... and thank you.

Goldfire.Name: Goldfire
Goldfire.Description: The drink's warmth invigorates the drinker.

Flare.Name: Flare
Flare.Description: A drink that's sure to awake your inner, sociable self.

Dewfire.Name: Dewfire
Dewfire.Description: If a burning drink isn't enough for you, try throwing in some bitter herbs.

Boomshine.Name: Boomshine
Boomshine.Description: Not a drink for the faint of heart... because it'll probably destroy the heart in the process.

Father Thyme.Name: Father Thyme
Father Thyme.Description: It's simple, herbal flavors bring you back to the olden days.

Morning Dew.Name: Morning Dew
Morning Dew.Description: It has that fresh, spring taste to it.

Twicler's Greed.Name: Twicler's Greed
Twicler's Greed.Description: How bad could it possibly be?

Twilight.Name: Twilight
Twilight.Description: Its soft, peaceful flavor tends to open the mind to new possibilities.

Mint to Be.Name: Mint to Be
Mint to Be.Description: There's no better way to make it than this.

Water.Name: Water
Water.Description: But if you pay us, you could have it BOTTLED!
